name: Lotad
author: Masakazu Fukuda
flavor_text: It looks like an aquatic plant and serves as a ferry to Pokémon that can’t swim.

attacks.name: Energy Ball
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to Lotad but not used to pay for this attack’s Energy cost. You can’t add more than 20 damage in this way.

attacks.name: Synthesis
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a {G} Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.
